description:
Pokémon TCG Companion allows you to browse and search through a database of cards complete with type, name, HP, moves, weakness, resistance, retreat cost, etc.

You can also keep track of the cards you own by inputting how many of each card you own. So if you're ever out and about and wonder if you've got a particular card, you can just whip out your webOS phone, and use Pokémon TCG Companion to find out.

Pokémon, the Pokémon logo, the energy symbols, Pokémon names and moves, and all other information are property of The Pokémon Company/Nintendo.

This application is an unofficial third party application and has no affiliation with The Pokémon Company or Nintendo
versionNote:
- Black & White cards
- Fixes to existing cards
